actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Shortsword attacks and one Dagger attack. It can replace one attack with Spellcasting.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 5 ft. or range 20/60' one target 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 80/320' one target 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Int (DC 13): At will: mage hand message minor illusion3/day ea: charm person sleep1/day: invisibility

bonus_actions.name: Cunning Action
bonus_actions.desc: Takes the Dash Disengage or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Knowledge Charm
special_abilities.desc: Carries a minor magical charm gifted to it by the organization. While wearing or carrying the charm infiltrator has proficiency in any two skills and is fluent in any one language (not included above). This proficiency and fluency last until charm is lost or destroyed or until infiltrator performs a 10-minute ritual to change the proficiency and fluency provided by the charm. If infiltrator dies charm becomes nonmagical.
